list.name: Default
list.comment: Added accountId as parameter in the Command and Event methods + added accountId in PaymentEntity for saving into the db

task.summary: Default task
Added .gitignore file
Added entities for every service and modified the server.port
Added elements in SagaOrchestrator module (with error in the CommandGateway)
Bug of CommandGateway solved + added id for saga, order, account and article
Added the compensated actions for payment and stock + added log file for saga + formatted output
Added account Id in Payment and BankAccountEntity
Added functionality to send messages from Orchestrator to services via AMQP + added event handlers on services to handle the incoming events from the Orchestrator
Bug fixed - communication between Orchestrator and services now happens without any error via AMQP
The initial command is now sent from the Order Service and it's not local in the Saga Orchestrator anymore
Order Service command sent by the right API
The Saga is no longer local, now it is distributed among the services (with no errors handling for now)
Errors handled and compensated actions done in the distributed saga
Added functionality of Event Store with MongoDB for Order, Payment and Stock services
Added OrderSaga file
Added OrderSaga file
Added Query Handler Component to handle the query side + saved the global info in a MongoDB collection
Added the materialized view for the Order + renamed folder from 'entities' to 'database' for Order, Payment and Stock services
Added materialized view for Payment service
Added materialized view for Stock service
Added paymentId as the Aggregate Identifier instead of the AccountId
Added accountId as parameter in the Command and Event methods + added accountId in PaymentEntity for saving into the db
